## NoteTag.CreatePen method

Creates a new note tag with Pen icon and specified label.

```csharp
public static NoteTag CreatePen(string label = "Highlight")
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| label | String | The tag's label. |

## Return Value

The [`NoteTag`](../../notetag).
